segments.text: So that's two boxes of the Holiday Macaroons. On behalf of the Brown Birds of America, I salute you.
segments.speaker: Sarah

segments.text: Just admit it Chandler, you have no backhand.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Excuse me little one, I have a very solid backhand.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Shielding your face and shrieking like a girl... is not a backhand.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: I was shrieking... like a Marine.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: All right here. Watch me execute the three 'P's of championship play. Power.  Precision.  and penache.
segments.speaker: Ross
